description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Monster Wisp, a puzzle game in which you must find and rescue stranded wisps throughout the woods.   While you avoid the dangers that are trying to steal the wisps you are trying to rescue.  The game features twenty five levels, some that will test your wits, some that will require quick timing and others that will test your search and rescue skills.
